description:
The Regulator is an advanced regular expressions testing tool, featuring syntax highlighting and web-service integration with Regexlib.com's database of online regular expressions.

Inspired by [expresso](https://chocolatey.org/packages/expresso).

[Forum](https://sourceforge.net/p/regulator/discussion/)
Documentation: [ZIP](http://sourceforge.net/projects/regulator/files/The%20Regulator/2.0.3/Regulator2Help.zip/download)
author: Roy Osherove
